website_summaries.verdict: Boasts a dual-layered construction that holds onto body heat while keeping moisture and cold out.
pros: Protective without being heavy or bulky
Fiber-filled inner thermal liner provides insulation to keep dogs warm
cons: Sizing can be a bit hit and miss, depending on your dog’s body type

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Chart Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Glad I ordered 2 in two different sizes. For some reason I received the Large (Red) before the Medium (Red), not sure why but I’m still awaiting the medium to arrive. I have 2 Pointers. (1) American Pointer (7yoa) her back measured at 19 and girth measured at 29 so I ordered her the Large. However the Large is too long even though the girth was ok but couldn’t get it tighter on her. See attached pictures wearing this Large with the garment tape. My 7yo fits in the Medium much better! The Medium was too large for my 1yoa GSP, so I’m ordering her the Small.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D Lee

customer_reviews.title: Seriously great dog coat
customer_reviews.text: Even my dog likes this coat. It's warm and keeps him dry, too. I was worried he wouldn't want too wear it, but on cold days he actually stands quietly and waits for me to put the coat on him. And he stays out longer on cold days when he's got it on. It isn't restrictive as far as I can tell, and he seems perfectly happy wearing it. I've owned a few other dog coats, this is BY FAR the nicest one. It even keeps his tummy warm, but it doesn't get in the way when he, um, you know. I raved about it so much that my daughter bought one for her dog, and he also likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen17

customer_reviews.title: Pup will actually wear this coat !
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty jacket. Love that it slips over head and has a couple drawstrings to help it stay put on our dog. Also the Velcro straps on each side make it fit nice and snug. Our dog can run and play with pals while wearing. It was a little too long in length so I shortened a few inches, not tough. Love this jacket, our dog hates coats and sweaters but will wear this on. Have not been out in rain yet to see if truly waterproof but looks like it will be. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the exact same style and size from the same manufacturer, but I got two different coats. I looked at the product image again and it seems to change the image based on the selected size, but these are both medium so the photo of my most recent purchase is inaccurate. One has a black base with a truncated red plaid; the other has a gray base with a full-length red plaid. It's a good product and even better if you like both of these styles, but I only like the style that was featured in the product image.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof- Fleece lined jacket that is reflective. Easy on & off.
customer_reviews.text: Great waterproof - Fleece lined jacket. Easy on & off, Velcro closures. No lifting of legs, etc... Piece comes down neck to chest & attaches on both sides of ribs. Good coverage for body, chest, & belly. Outer shell is also reflective, with stripes & speckles on most of jacket. Great jacket for Fenrir - my Senior German Short-Haired Pointer. Fen is 15yrs old, active, but gets cold easy.. Size large fits his 60 Lbs.. Extra lightweight neck coverage for his long neck. Great jacket for New England weather. Easy machine washable. Good Quality & good sale price!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coat!
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically write reviews, but I wanted to write a review for this coat because we love it so much. Even my dog loves it! It is made of quality material that I am sure will hold up over time, soft on the inside, water-resistant on the outside. And we love the neck warmer too. It's really easy to take on and off and our dog steps up proudly to get in his jacket....I kid you not! Last year we got a cheap coat and it didn't last. Definitely would recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: we really liked this coat on our dog and he seemed to stay warm! It’s a little big (size medium) for our one year old German short haired pointer mix but it still works great. I like that you can tighten the neck area so the heat stays in. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Burandt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for the dog
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the dog. Accurate measurement and the Velcro is pretty adjustable - good for skinny but large dogs. Easy to put on . No stretching over or having to make them step into anything. Velcro wasn’t very loud / scary ( for sensitive dogs) likes it so much I ordered a second for my other dog.
customer_reviews.author: Snopes p.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My 80lb. Weimaraner finds this coat very comfortable and he usually hates wearing a coat! It is very well made and I can tell it will last a long time. Good design and materials, worth the higher cost as compared to other dog coats.
customer_reviews.author: Two G's

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected. Great coat.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizing, waterproof on the outside, warm and fuzzy on the inside. Great product. Phone doesn’t get the color exactly right. It’s more brown.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great coat. The info was accurate. I got the petite size, but my dog is a little small even for that, so i just wish they would make an even smaller size. Nevertheless my dog wears it, looks adorable, and stays warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: The Jet

customer_reviews.title: BEAU LOVES HIS COAT!
customer_reviews.text: My elderly pit-rhodey mix has short hair and gets anxious and cold at night. This is a very high quality, easy to put on solution for him. It helps!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great nice closed up collar, reflective at night. I bought 3. Easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift--glad the size chart is accurate as it fits the pup perfectly and keeps him warm. Bonus is the adjustable neck area and opening for the leash. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: newtloot

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new winter coat for walking in bad weather with the dog. This works well
customer_reviews.author: JHDenver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shorthaired Pointer who has an extremely large barrel chest. He is only 55 lbs but I ordered a large. This coat is perfect. The velcro closure allows you to adjust how tight it is based on your dog's size. The lining is really soft and the outside seems water-resistant. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are right on.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit exactly what the measurements said. We have a 45lb beagle/boxer mix and her measurements were for a small and it fit perfect. It is easy on and off. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Renea Peruski

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Coat
customer_reviews.text: The coat fits perfect, this is the second one I have ordered, my dog has worn out the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great dog jacket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little boy. Keeps him warm and covers most of the belly
customer_reviews.author: Siren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Also bought two of this in case they discontinue the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off and warm
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased one of these coats for our GSP, who gets very cold in the winter and he loves it. This one was purchased for his English Setter brother for the same reason. It is super easy to put on and take off and he doesn't mind it at all. Allows complete movement and they can even do their "duties" while wearing it. If I had more dogs, I would purchase more! FYI, GSP is wearing a large and Setter is in a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, a little big but our girl is only seven months and has room to grow. We are ready now for colder and wet weather. It is very warm.
customer_reviews.author: KKGanous

customer_reviews.title: Buy it - you will love it
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect and it’s made really well. Would by another one in a different color or pattern too if they made it
customer_reviews.author: LD girl

customer_reviews.title: Good for our mutt with thin fur
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot for my 75lb pitt hound mutt mix... i have a heavier coat for him that is more for winter outside or in the snow but we learned one thing last winter and that was it wasnt very good at staving off snow or water (especially if snow melted). We put this on and it works like we wanted. Its not AS thick or warm as the other one we have but now we have two for different weather types which is totally fine. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Superb dog coat!
customer_reviews.text: We own many dog coats and use them daily for all seasons except summer. Our dog is not in great health and keeping her warm is a priority. This coat is very, very well made and impressive right out of the package. We found the sizing to be perfect. The coat is easy to get on and off and is thick and warm. It looks attractive on my dog (not that this is a priority) but it is a nice looking coat. The stitching is great quality and the velcro feels durable. After using a ton of inferior dog coats it is nice to finally have one that feels like it will last more than a season or two.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperShopping

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure how well my dog would tolerate this coat, but she loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable dog outer coat which helps to provide protection from wind, rain, and cold. It is very easy to put on and looks adorable. The fabric is water resistant, warm, and reflective, keeping your dog safe at night. There is an opening on the back to easily attach a leash to a harness or collar. The girth and neck are both adjustable so it is easy to customize the fit for your dog. At first I wasn't sure how well my dog would tolerate this coat, but she loves it and hasn't missed a beat since we put it on her.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 60lb Cattle Dog Mix Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a rather well made coat, which happens top fix my dog perfectly. It has a nice flap to open up for a leash, and it is easy to put on and take off. That last two bits are a challenge with a squirrly dog, and this really helps. Up until this arrived, I honestly didn't think I'd find the right size without trying on first (well my dog that is), but this magically just fit. The build seems well done, and I'm optimistic it will take well to washing, but I haven't had to do that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shane O. Laake

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality and Perfect For Really Cold or Wet Days
customer_reviews.text: What a great winter coat for your dog. I love the water proof trendy red/black plaid polyester material the outer top of the coat is made with while the underside which touches your dog is a wonderful fleece which will keep him nice and toasty warm. The neck opening is complete with a little drawstring which you can use to adjust the neck opening to prevent cold wind and rain from going down the jacket onto your dog. A very well designed, fabricated, and constructed coat with the comfort of your dog in mind. Totally love it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Great dog coat for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent dog coat! I got the large size and it fits both of my 50 pound mixed breed dogs just fine. It has so many nice features-a turtleneck with a drawstring to keep out the wind, reflective striping, waterproof fabric on the outside and soft fleece on the inside, a leash opening, and d rings to add clip on lights to. It is also very attractive! My dogs love it, and it keeps them warm during our cold NY winters.
customer_reviews.author: Wynne R. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: beautifully made dog coat - runs large
customer_reviews.text: Ultra Paws Ultra Reflective Comfort Coat is really nice. It is made from quality waterproof fabric which is really nice and insulated with microfiber inside This should keep any pup warm for a trip to the snow. It closes with velcro so you can get a nice tight fit. The neck is made from sweatshirt material and can be cinched closed. There are also reflective stripes in the pattern of the fabric. I ordered this for a 30-pound corgi but it was big enough for an 85 pound Aussie. The size range is 30-50 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been disappointed in several of these that claim to be large but wouldn't come anywhere near fitting. This is a medium and is true to size. I got it for my little Bluetick puppy (1 year) who weighs about 60 lbs of pure lean muscle and it fits perfectly. She gets cold but we also need something durable for her walks and playing at the dog park - this is fantastic. Well made, easy on/off, nice d ring and easy to clean. Fit is absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice plaid coat. The large fits a longer torso.
customer_reviews.text: My Lab is 60lbs and this fit him but was on the longer side. It really depends on the dog, but if you have a short 50 lb dog this will be too long. There is a size chart but the lower and upper measurements vary and you will really have to check if it fits. It's a nice coat though for Fall and Spring, not warm enough for winter I think.
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Coat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice comfort coat for your dog. Great in cold or wet conditions. The coat is water resistant and warm. The coat has the following: 1. Adjustable Neck. 2. Extended Chest Protection. 3. Opening for leash attachment. 4. D-rings on both sides to add clip lights. 5. Great Looking Coat. 6. Reflective Top. 7. Machine Washable. 8. Waterproof. 9. Various Sizes. This is a GREAT coat.
customer_reviews.author: Bill A. Belt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is pretty accurate although a bit large in the front in relation to the rest of the jacket. I had to look at directions to make sure I put the coat on correctly but once on my dog was happy with it. Since she hates rain a waterproof dog coat is perfect for her and this one performed pretty nicely. There is a flap that you open on top for a harness, so harness first then jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hersh

customer_reviews.title: Great Windbreaker For Dogs
customer_reviews.text: This wouldn't make much difference for the extreme cold temps we get in a Michigan winter, but it does keep the chill off the rest of the time. I have a Labrabull who fluctuates between 55-60 lbs (lean Lab build), and the large size is a little loose on her, but the medium size would be too small. As far as design, the velcro closures make it super easy to get on and off. In fact, I like the overall design better than most dog jackets.
customer_reviews.author: AstraDaemon

customer_reviews.title: Great looking coat. Getting the right size is a bit of a challenge
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great dog coat. Unfortunately, getting a good fit is a bit of a challenge. The medium is just a LITTLE too small for the Resident Hound, an older golden retriever who is on the small side (61 pounds). I am still looking for good ways to try to modify the coat/fit, since it is clear that a large would be quite a bit too large.
customer_reviews.author: Worddancer Redux

customer_reviews.title: Fits pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: The dog had to adjust to this Ultra Paws Ultra Reflective Comfort Coat a bit but he now seems to acclimated to it. It fits pretty well and is rather easy to put on and take off. I doubt that this would do much to keep him warm during a New England Winter, but it should be helpful for the Springs and Falls around here. Did I say that he looked good in it?
customer_reviews.author: Eric B. Borgman

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof but not super warm
customer_reviews.text: This coat is great for keeping some of the excess rain falling onto your dog and getting his fur wet during the rain. However, I wouldn't say it's very warm. So if you've got a short haired breed and you're trying to keep him warm in the extreme cold, I'd recommend another coat. But if you're just concerned about water and wind, this is great. Easy to put on and take off. Dog tolerates it well enough.
customer_reviews.author: LawyerMom

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits well and is easy to adjust. It goes on and off fairly easily. The inside is fleece and it provides a good bit of warmth for the part of the body that it covers. I'm not so fond of the plaid print but the dog doesn't seem to mind! It has an attachment for a leash but that doesn't work as well as using the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this dog coat. It fit my 55-lb dog very well, except it is a little short in length. However, I knew it would be, according to the stated measurements (which are pretty accurate, by the way). Has velcro to adjust the fit and generous head and leg openings, so it's not a struggle to get this on and off. The quality seems good and it's cute too!
customer_reviews.author: JJL

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Size offered is accurate, fit my 50 pounder with ease. I like the velcro wraps and turtle neck, it can possible double as a thunder type jacket. Good fit, good quality, and boy, does he look dapper. We live in a very rainy climate so this waterproof coat might be the thing that keeps me from going crazy with a perpetually wet dog. Very, VERY nice
customer_reviews.author: Aalea1

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort Coat for Larger Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Nice hefty and durable comfort coat for dogs afraid of storms. Could also be worm as just a nice coat for when you are walking your dog. Great fit and very snug. Very durable. Love the style and color. Fits as expected. Not too big and not too small. I would buy again or recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L. Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: 2 paws up
customer_reviews.text: I was worried at first it would be a wrestling event when time to put this on to go outside. Thankfully it wasn't. She just stood their peacefully while I got her in it and she didn't even try to chew it off afterwards. This makes me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Just so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this is so cute! I have a 5 month old black lab/pointer mix and this looks so adorable on him. He gets chilled pretty easily in our cold climate and this little jacket helps keep the cold wind from distracting him while he's outside trying to potty. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Where the Sidewalk Ends

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable padded fit that is adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: This fit an eighty pound black lab without problem. You can adjust it a bit with the straps. It has nice padding on top to act as a bit of insulation. It's easy to leash-in. It'll restrain your dog to act politely and help him maintain his body heat in the cold. Well made. Machine wash.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Medium
customer_reviews.text: My dogs, two of them at least, are considered Medium, a border collie and a GSD. This fits both of my Medium dogs. Larger would work too but I was pleasantly surprised that this fits. This is perfect for this time of year. We are in a season I like to call MUDPUPPY. Some people call is Spring, but well.
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a lab mix
customer_reviews.text: While this is huge for our 30# Juniper Peanut, we also have a black lab mix in the family. This jacket fit her perfectly! It is easy to put on, and has all the features you could want - waterproof, soft fleece lining, a slit for a harness ring on top, and great style. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Lippin

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This comfort coat is exactly what it says - Comfy! It's nice and flexible which is so much nicer than my boy's other stiffer jackets. I think the coat must run a little large or really is for a much longer dog than mine. Love the color and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Molly feels secure when wearing it...
customer_reviews.text: This is a red plaid and black dog coat. The coat has a reflective panel for safety. The coat is lined with fleece. The neck is adjustable. I love the look of this coat and Molly feels more secure when wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t rub anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is great for those rainy day walks or jogging with the beloved fur baby. Does a good job of keeping the rain off the fur and it is easy to figure out how to put it on. Doesn’t rub anywhere. Seems to be made of a strong yet comfortable material.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: great coat
customer_reviews.text: This fits my guy (black lab) perfectly. It's soft and warm and VERY water resistant. It keeps him dry when we're out hunting. It stays on well and even washes nicely, when needed. Overall, I love the look, feel, and comfort for my fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves wearing this!
customer_reviews.text: My lab looks so cute in this coat! It’s very easy to put it on her and it stays on without bunching up. It offers her protection from snow and cold weather. She likes wearing it and doesn’t try to take it off. I definitely recommend this coat!
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: Nice for cold winters
customer_reviews.text: This fits a 75 lb lab no problem. The inside is soft fleece and velcros around the belly. There is reflective details in the black part of the vest. There's even a hole for the leash to go through. This is ideal to have for cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cargill

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This coat is very good quality. It’s well made and heavyweight for cold weather. It’s quick and easy to put on and take off and it stays put. There’s a spot to hook the leash without pulling down the collar of the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: This medium coat is far too big for my medium cocker spaniel (23 pounds), but it's beautiful and warm. I love the attention to detail, like the drawstrings around the neck and the craftmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Slightly large on my 60lb pointer/America. Bulldog mix. She seemed to love it though especially when it’s snowy or rainy because she hates getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: ColeTan

product_meta.title: Ultra Paws Ultra Reflective Comfort Coat
product_meta.description: Size:Medium| Color:RedYou can't beat this warm, waterproof coat at its medium price point. New for 2017 you'll find original fabric patterns and full reflective lower fabric panels, plus reflective piping. The D-ring has been refined to add clip lights. Other features include an adjustable turtle neck, generous Velcro closures, expanded chest protection, opening for leash attachment, fiber fill inner lining and fleece inside. Designed in Minnesota.
feature_bullets: Polyester outer shell with polyester fleece liner and fiber fill
Comfy red plaid on the back and lower panel that is reflective in low light conditions
Adjustable turtle neck and extended protection for sensitive chest area
Opening for leash attachment and D-ring for adding clip lights
Medium size is designed for dogs between 30 and 50 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
